page.title: 06Village Fete - Sports Day
page.content: Each year in June the village has the annual Fete. First of all we have a guest to open the fete and give the prizes for the fancy dress, where children dress up in nice clothes. One year someone came as Andy Pandy. Then some children play some tunes on their recorders and violins. Then we have the running races. We also have the egg and spoon, obstacles, sack and the open race. Then we have a 5-a-side football match arranged by Mr. Bindley, and the winners get a plaque. Sometimes we have a pet show and a tug of war. Then you can go round the stalls. As well as the stalls, we have a bouncy castle and the swing boats. The stalls are organised by the Guides, Brownies, Youth Club, W.I., School, and the Church Lads and Girls. The Fete finishes at 6 o'clock.
